title: Science Education Effectiveness Improvement Program Using Digital Storytelling

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental scientific concepts and basic proficiency in digital tools
context.additional_context: Conducted in a smartphone-centric limited technology environment, focusing on creating science content applicable to real-life situations for working adult learners.

learning_goals: Learners create a 3-minute video visualizing scientific concepts using digital storytelling tools.
Learners analyze the educational effectiveness of storytelling-based science content in three or more ways through peer assessment.
Learners complete two infographics explaining scientific principles using smartphone apps (e.g., Adobe Spark, Canva).

resources: Open-source image database for science education
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
